DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of ONO-7746 in healthy adult subjects. The secondary objectives are to characterize the pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic profiles of ONO-7746.
DOC.brief_title: ONO-7746 Study in Healthy Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy nonsmoking male or female subjects (1855 years inclusive) Body mass index (BMI) of 1935 kg/mÂ² (inclusive) For females: postmenopausal, nonlactating and nonpregnant History or presence of clinically significant disease
